author: reinhard
msg: Make the HTTP port of Jetty configureable.
The JettyStarterMojo can be configured by the parameter 'port'.
Add a parameter 'keepRunning'. If true, the 'integration-test' phase
keeps running stops after the Jetty container has been started. This
is useful for debugging the 'integration-test' phase.

author: omalley
msg: HADOOP-3549. Give more meaningful errno's in libhdfs. In particular,
EACCES is returned for permission problems. (Ben Slusky via omalley)

author: elecharny
msg: Added some test for a special case : a replacement of an attribute which is indexed and not part of the initial entry (this has been fixed by Kiran)
